data.title: Modern Firearm Training at Home
data.meta_description: CONFIDENTIAL practice with your gun at home - no monthly fee, no profile, no sharing, no tracking. See the target-hits on your TV screen. Most realistic experience. BUY NOW: 99USD.
data.meta_site_name: LaserHIT - Modern Firearm Training at Home
data.text:
Pin point precision

There are two types of laser training devices on the market: LaserHIT HD and others. While other devices fire a laser beam for about 1/10 of a second when you pull the trigger, the laser strike can become unreliable if you move the gun. This can lead to developing the bad habit of holding the gun steady after the trigger is pulled, which negatively impacts your shooting performance during live fire.

LaserHIT HD is different. Its laser cartridge fires an extremely short laser beam, nearly 100 times quicker than other devices, with a duration of nearly 1/1000 of a second. This results in a perfect laser dot on the target every time you pull the trigger, as well as longer battery life. With LaserHIT HD, you can move your gun as quickly as you like and receive reliable results every time.

Don't be fooled by low-end laser cartridges. Make sure to ask the seller about the duration of the laser strike. Train with a reliable LaserHIT HD cartridge for the best results. Visit the page for more details.

Extended long range (up to 1 mile)

You read it right, up to 1 mile. Not 5 yards, not 10 yards, but 1,760 yards. The target may not be visible with the naked eye. However, you can hunt it with your scoped rifle. Thanks to the LaserHIT app, LaserHIT HD cartridge, and scaled targets. You may ask: "I will practice with a handgun. Why do I need the 1-mile system?" The answer is simple: LaserHIT app's universal core provides the same level of precision regardless of the practicing distance or firearm type. This powerful software tool is like sniper-grade gear in your toolbox. Learn it once, and use it with all your firearms. Visit the page to get yours now.

Basic FREE TARGET Practice

The Basic Firing Range setup is designed to start your training quickly. It is suitable for all kinds of firearms or laser training devices. Basic Setup will let you focus on shooting fundamentals while getting familiar with the system. You can practice with full-size or scaled targets in simulated distances up to 160 yards (approx. 150 meters) in your home environment. This Setup does not involve ballistic calculations. However, it supports an excellent exercise of target acquisition, breathing, and trigger control. Use single or multiple targets provided by LASERHIT or your targets in any size and shape. Visit the page for more details.

Advanced FREE TARGET Practice

The Advanced Firing Range setup is designed for experienced users. It is suitable for all kinds of firearms, from handguns to semi-auto or sniper rifles. Advanced setup lets you focus on shooting fundamentals with advanced instrumental measurements. You can practice with full-size or scaled targets in simulated firing range from point blank to extended long range of one mile in your home environment. This setup does not involve ballistic calculations. However, it supports an excellent exercise of target acquisition, breathing, and trigger control with advanced capabilities to work with extremely small targets. Use targets provided by LASERHIT or your own in any size and shape. Visit the page for more details.

BLACK STEEL Practice

Black Steel is multiple reduced-sized targets practice that allow you to focus on fundamental steps of variety of shooting competitions. Set up a “stage” right inside your house with LaserHIT Black Steel targets (or your own black targets any shape/size/quantity) and let start focus on how to draw, acquire targets acquisition, press the trigger, move to a position of cover, change magazines, etc. The same principles can be applied to other gun manipulations like reloads, switching between guns for multi-gun matches, and to moving into, out of, and between positions. Visit the page for more info about LaserHIT targets.
